
meta(?Var)

   Succeeds if Var is an attributed variable.



Arguments
   ?Var                Prolog term.

Type
   Type Testing

Description
   Used to test whether Var is an attributed variable.




Resatisfiable
      No.

Fail Conditions
      Fails if Var is not an attributed variable.



Examples
   
Success:
      meta(X{a}).
      suspend:(X>0), meta(X).

Fail:
      meta(atom).
      meta(X).





See Also
   free / 1, type_of / 2, var / 1
